body:
Here's the [benchmark](https://gist.github.com/yaroslavvb/1d358b155b0c9491b4c3d2a5570de42d). I seem to have done something strange to my environment because in official version, reduce_sum is pretty fast, hence closing this.

```
          numpy time 0.37053
             tf time 0.18646
       tf persistent 0.18634

```
